Package me.kverna.roger.server.video

Class VideoFeedTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.kverna.roger.server.video.VideoFeedTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class VideoFeedTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Long-lived task that connects to a camera's video stream and can relay the stream to other threads. It will stream the frames to any listeners by sending them one-by-one.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • VideoFeedTask

        public VideoFeedTask​(Camera camera)
              throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Create a video feed task to retrieve video from the given camera.
        Parameters:
        camera - the camera to retrieve video from
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if the camera's hostname or port is invalid

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener​(VideoFeedListener listener)
        Adds the given VideoFeedListener for output. This listener will be automatically removed when its `isAlive` method returns false.
        Parameters:
        listener - the VideoFeedListener to add to this service

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the service.

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • openStream

        private java.io.InputStream openStream()
                                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Opens a connection to the camera associated with the VideoFeedTask, and returns a stream when connected. It keeps retrying until a connection has been established.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while sleeping

      • sendToListeners

        private void sendToListeners​(net.sf.jipcam.axis.MjpegFrame frame)
        Send the given chunk to every listener. Any dead listeners will be removed.
        Parameters:
        frame - an MJPEG frame to send to all listeners
